name: 0 kara no Mahjong: Mahjong Youchien - Tamago-gumi
summary: This is a mahjong game specially designed for young players to learn how to play mahjong. The game features several game modes and a lot of different computer players to play against.

name: 0 kara no Shougi: Shougi Youchien - Ayumi-gumi
summary: This is a shogi game that features 5 different kind of boards, a complete tutorial and a dictionary in Japanese language, different vs modes (also a 2 player vs mode), a sort of a battle mode in which the player advance defeating opponents and the game has 10 different opponents.

name: 0 Kara no Mahjong: Mahjong Youchien - Tamago Gumi 2
summary: A direct sequel to 1999's mahjong game for kids 0 Kara no Mahjong: Mahjong Youchien - Tamago Gumi.
